About me

🌟 Responsible, organized, and a pro at building connections! 🌐

🚀 Tech stack includes: HTML, CSS, JS, jQuery, React, Next, Redux, Tailwind Bootstrap, Material Ui, Sass, Git, Firebase, Sql, MongoDb, Node js. Excited to dive into more technologies for continuous growth! 🌈
